desc: Based in Carlisle, Lala's brings you the beautiful scents of Spain direct to your UK homes. Fall in love with the fresh and unique scents of Spain's top selling brands such as Asevi, Brumol, Kiriko and many more. From floor cleaners to laundry detergents and softeners, Lala's brings the smell of Spain to you.

layout.text: Welcome To Lala's Spanish Cleaning Supplies
Great selection of Spanish cleaning supplies at unbeatable prices.
